description:
test: gofmt a few tests

I'm planning to change these tests, but the gofmt changes are
fairly extensive, so I'm separating the gofmt changes from the
substantive changes.

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=8c0e39009d5e ***

test: gofmt a few tests

I'm planning to change these tests, but the gofmt changes are
fairly extensive, so I'm separating the gofmt changes from the
substantive changes.

R=golang-dev, rsc, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5557052

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM if you want.

i kinda like that not all code we test is gofmt-ed, though.

> i kinda like that not all code we test is gofmt-ed, though.

Yeah, me too, but I want to change these tests and the codereview plugin wants them to pass gofmt.  I suppose we could modify codereview to ignore the test directory.

subject: code review 5557052: test: gofmt a few tests
